question: A person who will be unable to sexually satisfy his wife, should he marry?
answer:
QUESTION
A person is sexually impotent. He will not be able to satisfy his wife. What Allah has ordered for him with regards to marriage?
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

If a person is impotent, he should not marry until he undergoes medical
treatment to cure himself.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
